Summary: streaking through clear morning sky. VERY fast. Looked like something falling from sky. Large.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Newton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailscrystal clear saturday morning. five of us sitting at breakfast table which has panoramic bay window view to the south. three of us saw streaking silver \ gray object going from easterly to southwest while descending. very fast speed. speed caused a vapor trail behind object. appeared to be several miles from us. i am a private pilot so have a decent idea of distance in air. we live on the east texas and louisiana border apx 2 air miles from the border, the object appeared to be in louisiana airspace over eastern louisiana.
